scripts.build:ui: echo removing build && rm -rf build && echo cd to frontend && cd ../../part2/practice && pwd && echo build frontend && npm run build --prod && echo copy build back && cp -r build $OLDPWD
scripts.deploy: git checkout practice-notes-deploy && git merge `git subtree split -P part3/practice practice --annotate='(split) '` && git push heroku practice-notes-deploy:master
scripts.deploy:full: git checkout practice && npm run build:ui && echo commit build to backend && git add build && git commit -m UI-build && npm run deploy
